entry.data:
PATCHY FOG THIS MORNING
SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN A CHANCE OF RAIN WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF DRIZZLE THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF DRIZZLE IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 60
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
